text: Enywe abasuubila, Abakhasi Abasubili abawuyi nibabeetsela, mubareebe amareebo, Nyasaye niye umanyile muno obusuubili bwabu. Nimunyoola mbu nabasuubili mulabakalusia mubakhayi tawe. Bo shibakwaanila Abasaatsa abo tawe, ne abasatsa abo shibakwanile ninabo tawe ne mukalusilie abasatsa abo shiabarunga, (ikhwe) shinobubii enywe okhubateshia tawe niba mbu mubahelesia omurungo kwabu, Ne mulara Abakhasi abakhayi mukhuteshia khwenyu tawe. Nebareebe shiamwarunga nebareebe shiabarunga, ako niko amalako ka Nyasaye abusia hakari wenyu, Ne Nyasaye ni Omumanyi muno Owamachasi po
